tool.name: Sort a row
tool.command: python -c 'for line in ( "\t".join(sorted(line.strip().split("\t"))) for line in open("$infile") ): print line' > $outfile

param.name: infile
param.label: Tabular file that should be sorted

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**TIP:** If your data is not TAB delimited, use *Text Manipulation->Convert*
**What it does**
That tool sorts each row in a TAB separated file, according to their columns. In other words: It is a sorted reordering of all columns.
@REFERENCES@
